Exception thrown when add column binding to dynamic text
Steps to reproduce:
1.new a sample data source and data set
2.new a dynamic text and bind it to the data set 
3.click column in binding page
4.exception thrown 

Expected result:
no exception thrown

Actual result:
exception thrown
